data.text: Tuunchu ama'n ileiril soongmachumna kha eini'n nimu nasik Pathian in einidiang chong-inkhitna kha anapejei. Khawa soongmachumna chong-inkhitna kha nangni tu ka-ang inkhat innum muleiya ommak nasik, eini insingthei inlang omrui.

Ajarchu inmani'n inleijet angnga, eini innum Chongkahoi kha nijetjei. Inmani'n chongkha inleijet, takkha inmanisik khawa kha anemna leiommak, ajarchu inmani'n khawa injet phakhan ngamnale inruoiya leiralaangmu.
Eini akangamna ngai'n Pathian chong-inkhitna soongmachumna kha nimujei. Ama ileiti angnga,
Ajarchu nisari huuina jarra Chong-inthiang munkhat ah hiwahi aril: “Pathian in achuon rakip-ah inphut nisari huuini soong machum.” Inphut 2:2
Hiwa jartak hi aril nook-ah: “Inmani'n angtikniteii kei'n inmani diang kapesik soongmachumna ram kha luutnunu.” Minpkla 95:11
Tu ka-ang mansakhet-ah Chongkahoi kajet ngaikhan inngamnamak jarra soongmachumna kha ralaangmu, khawa soongmachumna kha kamusik izootpi lekkhatchu inom.
Hiwa malaarna khachu, “Awini,” inti nikhuo inkhat kha Pathian in inthiangnga aminsuuk ah ida eii. Kum angjet suoa ama'n Chong-inthiangnga kaom kha aleiya David diangnga ileiril kha angnga:
Joshua in Pathian chong-inkhitna soongmachum kha mi ngaidiang aleipe inchu, Pathian in leiilak nikhuo jarra rilkhainuni jei. Innidan 31:7; Josh 22:4
Khawa e-innum, nisari huuini Pathian in soong machum angnga, Pathian mi ngai soongmachum nasik alakaom eii.
Ajarchu Pathian in ama chuonna inphut soong machum angnga, tu ka-ang in Pathian soongmachumna kamu ngaikhan inchuonna inphut soong inmachumsik eii. Inphut 2:2
Khawajarra soongmachumna kha nimunasik eini'n akatha kha thorui, inmani inngamna asiin jarra inluutmak angnga eini tu inkhat um kaluutmak emui.

Ajarchu Pathian chong kha akaringchak le chuon kathochak, chemriam inni indou neek-ah kangei, ratha li malung inchunna, ru le ruthing injomna katung inthuuk ah ka-aat mator. Halli malung ngaidonna le manuomna ngaikha akathenkhoi mator kha eii.
Pathian diangnga inthup matorsik iteii ommak; ibool rakip ama maikuungnga inlar khat-um inlongnga kaom eii. Halli amadiang eini rakip nipumtak-ah nitho chuon jarkha nilape ngersik eii.
Khawajarra eini'n nirilsuok ngamna kha kacheet-ah ma-ourui. Ajarchu Thiampu Kaliankhet inkhat Pathian omna katung kasi Jisu, Pathian Sapa kha eini'n ninei.

Eini Thiampu Kaliankhet khan eini nisuolna ngaikha kanajetpimak kha emak. Khattiang nitili, eini angnga alam rakip-ah matheemna intongpui, takkha manu kathomak, Thiampu Kaliankhet inkhat kha eini'n ninei.
Khawajarra riangwai omna, Pathian reng in-ongna munkhan kachi omleiya nairui. Khawakhan eini'n minriang kha nimusik eii khat-um eini sik-ah arei ompha eini kanasansik ah riangwai kha nimusik eii.
